title: Wastewater Lift Station Monitoring
description: A SCADA system is monitoring a wastewater lift station for potential failures.

tasks.description: Monitor the wet well level and the run times of the pumps.
tasks.expected_outcome: System is continuously collecting operational data.

tasks.description: The system detects that the wet well level is high, but the pumps are not running.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates a critical alarm for a potential lift station failure.

tasks.description: Dispatch a maintenance crew immediately to troubleshoot the issue (e.g., power failure, clogged pump) before a sewer overflow occurs.
tasks.expected_outcome: System creates a Priority 1 emergency work order.
